programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Russell has an embarrassing lesson about art, and Jennifer's patience is tested by a visit from Adam's mother. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey are forced to find alternative entertainment when their TV breaks. Comedy, starring David Spade, Megyn Price and Bianca Kajlich

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey invite Adam and Jennifer to join them on a romantic getaway, but their true motivation is soon made clear. Meanwhile, the outfit chosen by Russell for an interview raises eyebrows. Comedy, starring Patrick Warburton, Megyn Price and David Spade

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Marshall worries his past indiscretions will cost him his dream job, and Ted is unsure about who to bring to the Architects' Ball. Comedy, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Ted tries to apologise to an ex-girlfriend for being unfaithful, while Marshall and Lily make a bet with Barney that could force him to wear a tie with a duck pattern on it. Comedy, starring Josh Radnor and Jason Segel

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon upsets guest star Stephen Hawking when they play an online game of Words with Friends, until Howard advises him to let the scientist win. Elsewhere, Penny enrols in a college class, but decides to keep it a secret from Leonard. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and Simon Helberg

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Amy and Wil Wheaton get into a fight while filming Fun with Flags, Sheldon suffers the consequences of their fall-out. He ends up going to Penny for advice and after getting drunk, confronts the actor in a bid to make him apologise. Bernadette encourages Howard to move out of his mother's house

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Freddie has no option but to hurt Lindsey, and in turn forces her to make a drastic decision. Leela is unable to hide her crush on Darren - so Tegan decides to organise a date for them. Meanwhile, Sam empowers John Paul, but he must try to reason with Patrick to save his career

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Lily's flat is turned into a Chinese restaurant, forcing her to move in with Marshall. However, Barney convinces Ted he will be driven from the house now his flatmate's fiancee is in residence. Comedy, starring Josh Radnor, Neil Patrick Harris, Alyson Hannigan, Jason Segel and Cobie Smulders

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Sid the sloth discovers three eggs - but when they hatch into dinosaurs, he struggles to keep them under control. The creatures' mother comes looking for her offspring and takes them and Sid to an underground world where the giant reptiles never became extinct. Sid's friends, aided by a crazed one-eyed weasel, head for this strange new land to rescue him. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Ray Romano and Simon Pegg

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: The magician continues to baffle and amaze unsuspecting members of the public, as he wreaks havoc at a football match with his powers of illusion, goes on a road trip like no other to Bournemouth and creates a unique way of getting across Tower Bridge in London

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon breaks up with Amy and turns to cats in his search for an alternative to human companionship. However, when he starts to bulk-buy pets, Leonard decides enough is enough and calls for reinforcements to help bring his friend back to his senses. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: An embarrassing secret from Howard's past comes to light as he tries to win back Bernadette, while Sheldon and Raj engage in a battle of wills when they have to work in the same office. Guest starring Katee Sackhoff and George Takei

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Alan tries to win Kandi back, and Charlie takes a shine to her mother. Meanwhile, Judith is set up with Kandi's father Andy. Guest starring Kevin Sorbo, Gail O'Grady and April Bowlby

programme.title: Take Me Out
programme.desc: The love lift delivers a London rugby player, a physiotherapist from Liverpool, a gymnastics coach from Bath and a Glasgow drainage engineer, all of whom are hoping to land a date with one of 30 single women on the Isle of Fernandos. However, to have any chance of succeeding, they must ensure the female participants keep their lights on as a sign of approval. But in the final round, if only one or two remain lit, they will have the choice of opting for the mystery girl, based solely on the sound of her voice. Paddy McGuinness presents

programme.title: Life's Funniest Moments
programme.desc: Video clips of hilariously candid moments captured on camera

programme.title: The Hot Desk - Example
programme.desc: Rapper Example receives a grilling in an interview over the Hot Desk from Dave Berry, Emma Willis, Nicole Appleton and Melanie Blatt

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: ITV2 Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Brenda is left shocked and humiliated when Bob reveals he has caught her stealing on camera, but she later declares she doesn't want his help. A fearful Val tells Eric she could be HIV positive and asks him to go to the clinic with her, while Diane suffers side effects from the medication. Chas realises Cain has had a part to play in James's imminent departure and Bernice decides to take matters into her own hands after the incident with Anton

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Peter and Tina enjoy a passionate evening in the flat above the bookie's while Carla is away, but Steve notices the lights are on and decides to investigate. A police officer turns up at the cafe wanting to talk to Fiz about Roy's disappearance, while Dennis tries to make amends with Rita, and Todd apologises for ruining Marcus and Maria's night out. Amy tricks Tracy and Steve into agreeing to take her to a museum

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Tina has to think on her feet when Lloyd and Steve catch her in a state of undress as Peter takes a shower. Fiz opens a parcel delivered for Roy in the hope it might hold some clues to his whereabouts, while Ritchie announces he's been poached by an international management outfit and is off to pastures new. Gloria is left fuming when Dennis tells Rita he loves her, and Todd spins a sob story about his father in a bid to get Marcus on his side

programme.title: You've Been Framed!
programme.desc: Harry Hill narrates a selection of viewer-submitted comical clips, featuring a quad bike with a mind of its own, Peter Pan taking a tumble and teeth being extracted with a baseball, plus the usual mix of cute kids, below-the-belt mishaps and practical jokers

programme.title: The Jeremy Kyle Show USA
programme.desc: The host takes his successful talk show stateside, where he invites American guests to air their differences, and dispenses his own judgment on the situation

programme.title: Dinner Date
programme.desc: Richard from Essex chooses three blind dates from five potential partners, based entirely on the menus they have created. When the three dinners have been eaten, he decides who he wants to see again. Narrated by Charlotte Hudson

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta
programme.desc: Lisa prepares for a future without Ed's salary, while Sheree tries to remain calm before her clothes go down the catwalk. NeNe returns Athens, where she met the man who claims to be her father, and clashes with everyone

programme.desc: New friendships are formed at Jacqueline's glamorous holiday party and despite their financial woes, Teresa and Joe concentrate on spicing up their relationship

programme.title: You've Been Framed!
programme.desc: Comedian Harry Hill narrates a selection of camcorder calamities and viewers' mobile phone footage, including a donkey with a cold, and a pair of daft fathers

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Jake's teacher calls a meeting with Alan and Judith to discuss the youngster's lack of interest at school, and Alan falls for Francine - upon realising his relationship with girlfriend Kandi is missing something. Starring Charlie Sheen, Jon Cryer and Angus T Jones

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: A girl from Jake's school invites him to his first boy-girl party. Alan and Charlie try to help him prepare for it by offering advice, but become nostalgic about their own first ones. Comedy, starring Charlie Sheen, Jon Cryer and Angus T Jones

programme.title: Bridget Jones
programme.desc: The disaster-prone journalist seems to have finally found the perfect boyfriend. However, when the couple start to squabble over their personal habits, she decides to decamp for a while to Thailand and write a travelogue. Unfortunately, she has reckoned without the reappearance of a duplicitous old flame - and a spell behind bars in a Thai prison. Romantic comedy sequel, with Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth, Hugh Grant, Jim Broadbent and Gemma Jones. Including FYI Daily

programme.title: The Brits Are Coming
programme.desc: Presenter Nick Grimshaw takes a look at the nominees for the Brit Awards 2014, and presents music from Rudimental and Tinie Tempah as well as this year's critic's choice winner Sam Smith

programme.title: Fake Reaction
programme.desc: Matt Edmondson hosts the comedy panel show in which captains Joe Swash and Ellie Taylor are joined by Olympic ski jumper Eddie `The Eagle' Edwards, The Big Reunion star Dane Bowers, comedian Stefan Abingdon and Hollyoaks star Nikki Sanderson to try to keep straight faces while enduring bizarre, painful or embarrassing distractions

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Charlie is unhappy to learn that Kandi has been living with Alan in his house for the past three weeks - especially since he himself has been going through a spell of bad luck with women. Starring Charlie Sheen, Jon Cryer and Angus T Jones

programme.title: Two and a Half Men

programme.title: Bridget Jones

Romantic comedy sequel, with Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth, Hugh Grant, Jim Broadbent and Gemma Jones

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: The glamorous Ruth Van Rydock contacts her old friend Jane Marple with a mystery - her sister Carrie Louise's study has been devastated by a suspicious fire. While Carrie Louise has the same cheerful outlook as ever, Ruth fears dark forces are at play at Stonygates, the home Carrie shares with her third husband, various relatives and a motley crew of young criminals, the latest subject of Carrie's philanthropic endeavours. But on the evening before a theatrical show is staged for their guests, one of whom is Miss Marple, an even more fascinating performance takes place before their very eyes - one where the final act is murder. Julia McKenzie stars, with guest appearances from Joan Collins, Penelope Wilton, Brian Cox, Maxine Peake, Alexei Sayle, Sarah Smart, Ian Ogilvy, Sean Hughes and Nigel Terry

programme.title: ITV3 Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: French Fields
programme.desc: William suffers his first brush with French law enforcers after Hester invites his new boss over for dinner. Comedy, starring Julia McKenzie and Anton Rodgers

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A prodigal son returns to claim his inheritance, setting off alarm bells for Ventress, whose instinct is confirmed when a series of accidents at the carpet factory signals the management's scant regard for life and limb. Meanwhile, Vernon Scripps spies an opportunity to make merry as well as money by organising a beauty pageant - but reckons without the determined opposition of disapproving Joyce Jowett, who will stop at nothing to halt the event

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Mr Middleditch makes a surprise return to the hospital in the back of an ambulance, having hurt his ankle while fishing. Stella grudgingly welcomes Marian McKaig as her room-mate, but the new nurse quickly catches Alun's eye. Meanwhile, a frantic mother calls for Mike's help at a hippie commune, where her hostile husband is refusing help from the outside world. Ian Carmichael rejoins the series, which continues from earlier in the year. With Ted Robbins

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The Belgian detective begins to suspect something is amiss when he visits one of his favoured haunts in London for dinner and discovers a fellow regular has dramatically changed his diet. Down in Brighton, elderly Anthony Gascoigne lies dying while his estranged twin brother Henry falls to his death - but nobody is sure whether the man was deliberately pushed. Bizarrely, the key to the riddle seems to lie in a blackberry pie. David Suchet stars in the title role, with Philip Jackson, Hugh Fraser and Pauline Moran

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: Real-life small-claims cases on issues affecting family life, presided over by outspoken former New York judge Judy Sheindlin

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: Real-life small-claims cases on issues affecting family life, presided over by outspoken former New York judge Judy Sheindlin

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: Real-life small-claims cases on issues affecting family life, presided over by outspoken former New York judge Judy Sheindlin

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica is invited to witness the reappearance of a mysterious comet, but instead finds herself conducting another murder investigation. Angela Lansbury stars

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The mystery surrounding a legendary racehorse's disappearance is solved with the help of one of the most famous clues in the Holmes canon - `the curious incident of the dog in the night-time'. Victorian detective drama, starring Jeremy Brett and Edward Hardwicke

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Hippies colonise Lawson's holiday cottages, causing much local dissent and tut-tutting. The only people who don't object to their presence are an undercover journalist in search of a scoop, and Vernon, who is not slow to spot a way of capitalising on the situation. Starring Geoffrey Hughes and Malcolm Tierney

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: A patient is admitted with a fever and a swollen arm covered in black lesions, but Mike is nowhere to be seen. Blood tests confirm a case of anthrax, prompting an investigation by the Public Health Officer. Elsewhere, a specialist is summoned when a woman's dizzy spells cause concern, while Alun and Lizzie are intrigued by the mysterious appearance of a young woman

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: After enjoying a trip to the theatre with Captain Hastings, the detective is disturbed by the sound of gunshots in an apartment at Whitehaven Mansions, and soon finds himself investigating a murder. Drama, starring David Suchet, Hugh Fraser and Philip Jackson

programme.title: French Fields
programme.desc: Emma and her husband arrive for a short break - but William and Nester find the experience of putting them up exhausing. Comedy, starring Julia McKenzie and Anton Rodgers

programme.title: Second Thoughts
programme.desc: Bill asks Faith to celebrate moving in together by painting the town red, but she has other priorities to consider. Comedy, with James Bolam, Lynda Bellingham and Belinda Lang

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: George's jealousy rears its ugly head, but Mildred is in no hurry to put his mind at rest

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Hippies colonise Lawson's holiday cottages, causing much local dissent and tut-tutting. The only people who don't object to their presence are an undercover journalist in search of a scoop, and Vernon, who is not slow to spot a way of capitalising on the situation. Starring Geoffrey Hughes and Malcolm Tierney

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica investigates whether a curse on a stolen Indian pendant could be responsible for the death of Seth's brother. Angela Lansbury stars

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When director Nick Cheyney is found beheaded by a guillotine on the set of his latest film, Barnaby and Jones are left with no shortage of suspects. The victim, it transpires, was on poor terms with several people in some way connected to the project, including the mother of his child, and an actor who blamed him for ruining his career. Guest starring Nicky Henson

programme.title: The Ice Cream Girls
programme.desc: With Poppy seeking revenge, Serena struggles to block out the memories from her past. As her mother's health deteriorates, she realises she must face the burden on her own, and resolves to report her former school friend to the probation services. Excluded and alone, Poppy remains determined to get the truth from Serena, and confides in lifeguard Al. Drama based on the novel by Dorothy Koomson, starring Lorraine Burroughs, Jodhi May, Martin Compston and Dona Croll

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: When a 16-year-old girl is found dead in her home, Brooks and Devlin cannot be sure a crime was even committed. On further investigation, an unlikely murder weapon is uncovered and a suspect identified - a recently released serial rapist. Determined the accused is guilty, Steel pursues him with every power available - pushing the boundaries of the law to the limit. Crime drama, guest starring Kevin Doyle (Drop Dead Gorgeous), with Ben Daniels

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Three people are murdered in a shop in central London and a fourth is left for dead, and Brooks and Devlin are up against the clock to find a killer who they fear could strike again. When a suspect is brought to trial, Steel's hopes for a relatively straightforward case are dashed when he finds himself pitted against a brilliant defence lawyer. Crime drama, guest starring Rupert Graves and Amanda Root

programme.title: George and Mildred

programme.title: Heartbeat

Starring Geoffrey Hughes and Malcolm Tierney

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When director Nick Cheyney is found beheaded by a guillotine on the set of his latest film, Barnaby and Jones are left with no shortage of suspects. The victim, it transpires, was on poor terms with several people in some way connected to the project, including the mother of his child, and an actor who blamed him for ruining his career. Guest starring Nicky Henson

programme.title: The Ice Cream Girls
programme.desc: With Poppy seeking revenge, Serena struggles to block out the memories from her past. As her mother's health deteriorates, she realises she must face the burden on her own, and resolves to report her former school friend to the probation services. Excluded and alone, Poppy remains determined to get the truth from Serena, and confides in lifeguard Al. Drama based on the novel by Dorothy Koomson, starring Lorraine Burroughs, Jodhi May, Martin Compston and Dona Croll

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Disaster strikes on the camping trip when Mason goads Josh into having a go at abseiling. Back on Ramsay Street, Callum finds his way back into Josie's good books when he buys her a puppy, while Sonya tells Jacob to leave Erinsborough - but still manages to hurt Toadie's feelings

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Fed up with unwanted advice, Ricky calls a family meeting to declare she will make her own decision about the baby. Ms Montgomery goes on the offensive after Bianca's complaint, while Tamara tries to think of a way to help integrate the Summer Bay and Mangrove River students. Chris is nervous about his first day at work

programme.title: Cowboy Builders
programme.desc: Dominic Littlewood and Melinda Messenger travel to Cramlington, near Newcastle-upon-Tyne, to help Michelle and Dominic Cairns, whose partly renovated house has been identified by the local council as having more than 100 defects after a builder walked off the site. Melinda and her team try to fix the damage, but find a major problem lurking in the drains, while co-host Dom tracks down the man responsible for the mess - and discovers he is a fan of the show

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Officers join forces with Ofcom to raid an illegal pirate radio station, and two other specially trained lawmen track down a suspected drug runner on the M25. At a national car event, the Mitsubishi Evo 10 police vehicle proves to be popular with thousands of auto enthusiasts

programme.desc: Behind-the-scenes news and gossip from the world of showbiz

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Disaster strikes on the camping trip when Mason goads Josh into having a go at abseiling. Back on Ramsay Street, Callum finds his way back into Josie's good books when he buys her a puppy, while Sonya tells Jacob to leave Erinsborough - but still manages to hurt Toadie's feelings

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Bianca suspends Ms Montgomery after her claim that Heath assaulted her is shown to be false when Tamara tells the police she saw him surfing at the time of the alleged attack. Matt's flirtatious behaviour with Evelyn lead to a fight with Oscar, while Kyle helps Tamara pursue her plan to organise an unofficial music festival

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor looks back at his 10 best moments from series one and two of the angling programme. Highlights include a battle with a fast predator in Costa Rica, a close encounter with a barracuda off the coast of America, and a stormy experience on a trawler in Vancouver

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor begins his journey at Lake Kariba in Zimbabwe, where he hunts down the vundu catfish, known locally as the `steam train' because of its strength. He also examines the kapenta fishing industry, which is integral to life in the country because it provides protein for the low-income populace. In Victoria Falls, he has to prove his courage when angling for tiger fish in a deep pool called the `boiling pot', before braving the Zambezi's white-water rapids

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie Hart is taken off active duty and made the face of the bureau's publicity campaign, but would rather catch crooks than be the focus of media attention - so when her friends are kidnapped, she disobeys orders to run her own undercover investigation with the help of a short-tempered colleague. Comedy sequel, starring Sandra Bullock, Regina King, William Shatner and Heather Burns

programme.title: The Big British Immigration Row
programme.desc: A studio debate exploring the emotive and controversial topic of immigration, examining how it is affecting the United Kingdom and its citizens. Subjects covered include national identity and racial and cultural integration, with contributions by MPs, decision-makers, opinion-formers and immigrants themselves

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Mac and Lindsay investigate the fatal shooting of singer Kid Rock's chauffeur, whose body has been found backstage by a fan. The case proves baffling, and as events unfold, a second murder takes place - in Stella's apartment. Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise, Anna Belknap and Melina Kanakaredes

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Blade takes Vanessa to Paris to see a doctor, only to be told horrifying news about her pregnancy, while Marcus sends Krista to retrieve a special item from her

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Part two of two. Captain Murphy threatens to detonate his nerve-gas missiles over the Eastern Seaboard unless his demands are met, so Archer and the ISIS agents disguise themselves as news crew to target him in his underwater Sealab. While on the mission, it is revealed that Lana is pregnant, but Cyril is not the father. Last in the series

programme.title: My Name Is Earl
programme.desc: Pilot episode of the comedy, starring Jason Lee as Earl Hickey, a man struggling to atone for the many sins he has committed throughout his life. Earl wins $100,000 on a scratchcard, but loses the ticket after being knocked down by a car. In hospital, he decides to make amends for past mistakes - beginning with finding the boy he used to bully in school

programme.desc: A tenacious lawyer sets out to expose a devious gynaecologist who claims he can help infertile women become pregnant, convinced he is guilty of murder - but she is placed in peril by her investigation. Mystery, adapted from a novel by Mary Higgins Clark, starring Angie Everhart, John Ralston and Philippe Brenninkmeyer

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Horatio investigates the murder of a woman working for a dating agency, and although suspicion initially falls on an angry client, DNA testing reveals the killer was female. Valera later finds evidence that could solve the case - but unfortunately it would also violate the privacy of a rape victim. Elsewhere, Delko loses his badge and sets out to find it before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Horatio and the team discover a woman's body in a secret tunnel leading to a bank vault and begin checking into her background. DNA evidence leads them to a man employed at a nearby building site, but subsequent developments implicate a millionaire's wayward daughter - and a bogus art dealer with links to the drug trade. Starring David Caruso and Adam Rodriguez

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: Jesse and Dr Sloan are infected with a virus and face imminent death unless Steve and Amanda can find a cure. Crime drama, starring Dick and Barry Van Dyke, with Victoria Rowell, Charlie Schlatter and Michael Tucci

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the murder of a luxury sports car dealer and identify a link between the victim's last customer and a recent spate of robberies. However, the discovery that their prime suspect has learning difficulties soon leads the team to his manipulative girlfriend. Detective drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Flack looks into the death of a paintballer who was seemingly murdered when his killer swapped harmless ammunition for real bullets. The prime suspect turns out to be a rival who was competing with the victim for a sponsorship deal, but finding him is no easy matter. Meanwhile, Stella tells Mac she thinks she is being stalked. Forensic drama, starring Gary Sinise, Eddie Cahill and Melina Kanakaredes

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Mac and Danny raise questions over the murder of a US Marine corporal found stabbed to death in Central Park. A case of mistaken identity arises as Stella, Lindsay and Dr Hawkes investigate a body in a burnt-out car, and Sheldon makes a surprising discovery after creating a facial reconstruction from the skull. With Gary Sinise, Melina Kanakaredes and Carmine Giovinazzo

programme.title: Longmire
programme.desc: Walt investigates when a rodeo sponsor is assaulted in his own home and left in a coma. The only clue is the theft of a seemingly worthless painting

programme.title: Magnum Force (1973)
programme.desc: Maverick cop Dirty Harry Callahan antagonises his superiors once more in his pursuit of a vigilante group responsible for murdering the city's most wanted criminals. However, he is unaware that the killers are some of his fellow officers - and are prepared to see him dead to keep their secret safe. programme.title: Nightline
programme.desc: An incisive late-night news series that analyzes the day's top stories with interviews and reports. It occasionally features program-length documentaries, weeklong series and town-hall forums. The program began in November 1979 as 'The Iran Crisis: America Held Hostage', with Frank Reynolds anchoring. Ted Koppel took over shortly thereafter and it expanded its scope (and took the name 'Nightline') on March 24, 1980. Koppel served as anchor until 2005, when he was replaced by a troika of hosts

programme.title: Nightline
programme.desc: An incisive late-night news series that analyzes the day's top stories with interviews and reports. It occasionally features program-length documentaries, weeklong series and town-hall forums. The program began in November 1979 as 'The Iran Crisis: America Held Hostage', with Frank Reynolds anchoring. Ted Koppel took over shortly thereafter and it expanded its scope (and took the name 'Nightline') on March 24, 1980. Koppel served as anchor until 2005, when he was replaced by a troika of hosts

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. It mixes news---from a religious perspective---with inspirational interviews with celebrities, along with Bible readings and entertainment. Conservative icon (and 1988 presidential candidate) Pat Robertson founded the hugely popular program from a 1963 fund-raising pledge effort on UHF TV in Virginia

programme.title: Let's Make a Deal
programme.desc: An update of the classic game show in which contestants wearing outrageous costumes make deals with the host to win money and prizes

programme.title: The Price Is Right
programme.desc: 'Come on down!' Contestants guess retail values for prizes on TV's longest-running game show. Bob Barker racked up over a dozen hosting Emmys since CBS first aired the daytime staple in 1972, though it originated with Bill Cullen on NBC (1956-63) and ABC (1963-65). However, it was the genial, ageless Barker who really sold viewers on the show, which spawned several syndicated offshoots and a string of prime-time specials. When Barker retired in 2007, Drew Carey stepped in to ably fill his shoes

programme.desc: A series featuring biblical teachings and reports on Christian relief efforts

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Creator-producer Merv Griffin's classic game-show version of `hangman' has kept on spinning for three decades. The money and prizes have gotten bigger over the years, but the basic format and difficulty of the mystery phrases have pretty much remained steady. Another series constant has been the nation's premier (and most fashionably dressed) letter-turner, Vanna White, who parlayed the gig into a bestselling 1987 autobiography. As for host Pat Sajak, he has won three Emmys for the series

programme.title: Grand Coulee Dam
programme.desc: The history of the Grand Coulee Dam on the Columbia River in Washington, which was one of the centerpiece projects of FDR's New Deal during the Great Depression. A controversial undertaking, it transformed the Pacific Northwest for good and bad, providing needed energy to the growing cities of Portland and Seattle even as it wiped away entire towns, dislocated Colville Indian Reservation tribes, and blocked the ability of salmon to reach their spawning grounds

programme.title: The Rise and Fall of Penn Station
programme.desc: The story of New York's Pennsylvania Station, which opened to the public in 1910. One of the greatest architectural and engineering achievements of its time, it covered nearly eight acres and required the construction of 16 miles of underground tunnels. It closed its doors some 50 years later, giving way to Madison Square Garden, a high-rise office building and sports complex

programme.title: Frontline
programme.desc: How marketers use social media to get teenagers to sell products to themselves—and collect valuable data in the process. Included: whether the division between marketing and authenticity still exists; the hidden alchemy that brands use to win over teens

programme.sub-title: Repeated Blows to His Unformed Head

programme.desc: A surprise visit by Booth's girlfriend, war correspondent Hannah Burley (Katheryn Winnick), forces Brennan to take another look at her relationship with Booth. Meanwhile, the team tries to identify a couple whose remains were found in a cave in a national park

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan's whirlwind tutorial in pop culture gets put to the test when she and Booth investigate the remains of a 23-year-old man who was seen carousing the previous evening at a Jersey-shore nightclub. Meanwhile, Hannah hits it off with the Jeffersonian team; and Angela tries to keep a personal matter secret

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Beckett and Castle investigate the death of a big-name chef found frozen in a restaurant's kitchen. Meanwhile, Castle finds himself attracted to the restaurant's owner, who just happens to be an old friend of Beckett's. Rocco DiSpirito appears as himself

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Castle and Det. Demming vie for Beckett's attention as the two men scramble to solve a robbery-homicide case, each using their own unique methods

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: In the Season 2 finale, Castle and Beckett investigate the apparent assassination of a covert agent and deal with their feelings for each other

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: In the third-season premiere, Beckett finds Castle at a murder scene holding a gun and is forced to arrest him despite his claims of innocence

programme.title: Cold Justice
programme.desc: A 2002 double murder in small-town Arkansas is investigated

programme.title: Cold Justice
programme.desc: A 2002 double murder in small-town Arkansas is investigated

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: An ice age is brought on by the effects of global warming and paleoclimatologist Jack Hall struggles through the masses fleeing south for warmer climate on his way north to reunite with his son

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The search is on for an abducted woman who's about to give birth. Rose Granville: Shirley Knight. Melinda Granville: Kellie Martin. Daniel Lester: Gabriel Olds. Laura Bergeron: Marisa Ryan. Annika Bergeron: Karen Goberman. Sam Marlett: Clarke Thorell

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The investigation of a gay man's murder, following a party in his apartment building, involves an ex-con and his brother. Jesse Hansen: James McCaffrey. Ray: Alex Sullivan. Lorraine Hansen: Amy Ryan. Off. Bandolini: Peter Rini. Steven Hale: Stephen Barker Turner. William Langdon: Jerry Lanning. Stabler: Chris Meloni. Mariska Hargitay. Much: Richard Belzer

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: While promoting “Good Girls, Bad Boys,” author Lilith and a talk-show audience of women throw themselves at bad boy Sam. Brenda Balzac: Phyllis Katz. Viper: Lorelle Brina. Gloria: Peggy Mannix. Donna: Donna Fuller. Marti: Marti Muller. Audrey: Audrey Rapoport. Marsha: Marsha Kramer

programme.title: White Collar
programme.desc: Peter and Neal uncover a link between Fowler and an estate judge who's committing mortgage fraud. Armed with this information, the guys devise a plan to take them both down

Gripping remake of the 1957 Western about a rancher (Christian Bale) escorting an outlaw (Russell Crowe) to a rendezvous with the law, while the latter's henchmen try to head them off and free their leader. Directed by James Mangold, from a story by Elmore Leonard

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Benson continues looking after a young boy entrusted in her care while also searching for his unstable, drug-addicted mother. His mom's name then turns up during an investigation, which Cragen assigns to Fin and Munch in order to keep Benson away from the case

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A young boy is found beaten to death, and the case leads detectives to uncover a gambling ring as well as evidence of a wife (Drea de Matteo) being abused

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An art patron (LuAnn de Lesseps) finds a body, and when detectives question the murdered woman's good friend (Kate Burton) and associates, they uncover an antagonistic work environment filled with grown-up bullies

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A family man's stabbing leads to the exposure of his secret pastime at a swingers' club. Benson and Stabler then go undercover at the club, where they encounter a flirtatious woman (Rose McGowan) with a possessive boyfriend

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A young girl's body is found with a doll left as a totem, so police retrace her last steps, which included a lesson with her piano teacher (Elizabeth Mitchell). They then seek help from a psychologist (Jeremy Irons) who decodes the meaning of the totem

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A billionaire (Colm Feore) becomes a suspect in a sexual-abuse case involving a teenage girl, and his highly paid attorney (Robert Klein) is able to make the case veer off course

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: After a sexual assault is broadcast on a college's intranet, Stabler and Fin look for the people involved. During the investigation, the attacker's attention-seeking motives come to light

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A woman (Taryn Manning) is attacked in her apartment, and detectives must ask her to revisit her painful buried past in order to solve the case

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A woman (A.J. Cook) is raped by a masked man and her partner is severely beaten by him. The injured woman's estranged father (Jeremy Irons) is notified of the incident, and when police question him, they find themselves confronting an uncooperative man with a sordid past

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Benson partners with a female detective (Shohreh Aghdashloo) to investigate a DA's murder, and evidence of crime-scene tampering is found. The case then leads Benson to seek help from an assistant U.S. attorney (Gloria Reuben)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The TV host (Debra Messing) of a show that spotlights predators receives threats to her safety, and this reawakens her hunt for her sister's abductor. An ADA with connections to the TV host then assists detectives in their investigation

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire goes to her college reunion by herself and encounters a professor she dated, a situation that turns awkward when Phil shows up out of the blue. Meanwhile, Jay can't stop thinking about an upcoming bowling tournament; and Gloria gives in to Mitchell's offer to babysit Joe to give her a break, but Cameron sees a chance to use the boy in one of his elaborate photo shoots

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Cameron is upset when Fizbo the clown is nixed from the guest list for Lily's princess-theme birthday party, but the invitees do include Mitchell's mom (Shelley Long), who shows up with Claire's high-school boyfriend (Matt Dillon)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The entire Pritchett clan go to Disneyland, where Phil has trouble keeping up with Luke; Claire is surprised by an encounter with Dylan; Jay and Gloria debate suitable footwear; and Mitchell and Cameron cope with Lily's recent inclination to run anywhere at anytime

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Gloria is unnerved by the arrival of Javier (Benjamin Bratt), her ex and Manny's notoriously untrustworthy father; Claire takes action when Phil suffers from kidney stones; Mitchell and Cameron try to sleep-train Lily

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mitchell and Cameron have a chance encounter with Mitchell's old girlfriend (Mary Lynn Rajskub); Gloria's efforts to befriend another couple annoy Jay; Phil and Claire encourage Alex to lighten up on her schoolwork

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Haley gets arrested for underage drinking, prompting a frantic trip to the police station for Claire, Phil and the family lawyer, Mitchell, leaving Alex and Luke under Cameron's shaky supervision. Meanwhile, Jay is surprised by a visit from his ex-wife, Dede, but he tries to get rid of her before she finds out that Gloria is pregnant

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Benson continues looking after a young boy entrusted in her care while also searching for his unstable, drug-addicted mother. His mom's name then turns up during an investigation, which Cragen assigns to Fin and Munch in order to keep Benson away from the case

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A young boy is found beaten to death, and the case leads detectives to uncover a gambling ring as well as evidence of a wife (Drea de Matteo) being abused

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: In trying to locate a 9-year-old who called 911 claiming to be locked in a room, Benson realizes that the girl is a child-pornography victim. Richard Dwyer: Christopher Evan Welch. Voice of Maria: Flora Diaz. FBI Agent Rachel Sorannis: Chandra Wilson. Benson: Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Fin's estranged son (Ernest Waddell) helps his father in the investigation of the murders of two gay men. Gabriel Thurman: Brian Bloom. Carolyn Maddox: CCH Pounder. Liam Weller: Bill Smitrovich. Fin: Ice-T

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Misuse of a prescription drug is involved in the killing of two students. Barry Moredock: John Cullum. Joe Blaine: Rory Culkin. Sandra Blaine: Mare Winningham. DA Branch: Fred Dalton Thompson. Jane Wellesley: Amy Hargreaves. George Waddell: Bill Cwikowski. Dean Reynolds: Patrick Dizney

programme.title: Olympics 2014
programme.desc: A women's curling semifinal at the Ice Cube

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A marine's wife (Megan Ward) living on a military base shoots an intruder who attempted to rape her, and Gibbs' team uncovers a mysterious connection between the woman and her assailant. Jeremy: Neil Hopkins. Kate: Sasha Alexander. Tony: Michael Weatherly. Abby: Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony poses as a prisoner in an undercover operation, and is chained to a thief (Frank Whaley) he helped to escape in an effort to locate stolen Iraqi antiquities. Deputy Secretary of State Anna Elliott: Annie Corley. Tony: Michael Weatherly

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A famous private investigator (Mike Starr) sticks his nose into Gibb's case involving the discovery of the body of a Navy officer who vanished in 2002, and whose family is offering a reward for answers regarding his death. Cindy Ames: Gina St. John. Sheriff Lester: Mark Damon Espinoza. Kate: Sasha Alexander

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is baffled by the disappearance of a Navy officer and the presence of clues that could suggest foul play. But Kate is more puzzled by an investigating detective (John Doman) and his team who are identical in character to Gibbs, Tony and McGee. Det. Monteleone: Chad Willett. Det. Miller: Will Burke

programme.title: Olympics 2014
programme.desc: Men's hockey (quarterfinal)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Three dissected bodies are found in cannisters and Ducky realizes that there's a link between the bodies and an old murder trial that required his expert testimony. Vanessa Mallard: Nina Foch. Vincent Hanlan: Morgan Weisser. Jonathan Hanlan: Pat Healy

programme.title: Navy NCIS
programme.desc: Heartland

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team must work on a difficult case during the week of Christmas when it's learned the prime suspect has supposedly been dead for 17 years. Ned Quinn: Peter Coyote

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The enlisted son of a retired colonel who became a preacher is found dead, and the team believes he was the victim of a hate crime. Meanwhile, Gibbs' father (Ralph Waite) visits, and Gibbs is perplexed by his unusual behavior

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Conclusion. In the seventh-season finale, Gibbs faces a drug cartel in Mexico, and he makes a monumental decision that calls into question the rules by which he lives

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: In the eighth-season opener, the Reynosa cartel tries to hurt Gibbs by going after those he loves, and Gibbs must take extreme steps to protect them from harm

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs questions choices he has made when he stares down the barrel of a gun at a local diner. The show's 200th episode

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A petty officer is gunned down in a billionaire's car, and the investigation links the crime to a man Gibbs was named after

programme.title: Psych
programme.desc: Shawn, Gus, Lassiter and Woody are drugged and wake up with no memories of the night before. Things get worse when a dead body surfaces and the clues point to the foursome as the culprits. In order to clear their names, they try to piece together their lost night

programme.title: Psych
programme.desc: Gus accidentally tampers with the crime scene where his boss was killed, so Shawn launches a hunt to find the murderer in order to clear Gus' name

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Kensi is shot while in a bank during a robbery by three armed criminals who hold hostages

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The investigation into a shooting at a nightclub involving an acquaintance of Logan's involves the shadowy world of amateur boxing

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A student's death leads the detectives to uncover a private school's online culture, obsession with grades and secretive nature

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: After a psychiatrist (Susanna Thompson) has been raped in a crack house, she's very uncooperative with the investigation. Robert Logan: Jon Abrahams. Christina Logan: Sherri Parker Lee. Jordan: Daniel Zaitchik. Dominick: Bill Thompson

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The investigation of a judge's murder involves blackmail, sexual favors, and a convict's wife (Kathryn Meisle), who was a battered spouse

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: After her husband is killed, a municipal worker disappears and the investigation implicates a former police commissioner (Michael Rispoli). Janice: Jenna Stern. Marie Adair: Liz Keifer. Anya: Roxanna Hope. Czabo: James Lee. Goren: Vincent D'Onofrio

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Goren and Eames investigate a judge's murder and zero in on two men who are suspected of a series of killings out West. Lloyd: David Andrews. Eric: Jeremy Blackman. Eames: Kathryn Erbe. Goren: Vincent D'Onofrio

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: M.E. Warner finds herself directly involved in a kidnapping case when she visits the home of an abducted 8-year-old girl to inform the child's parents that a DNA test has revealed that their daughter has leukemia. Tom Verica

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives attempt to track down an extremely dangerous sex offender (Lou Diamond Phillips) who has kidnapped two children after brutally murdering their mother, stepfather and older sister

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Stabler receives an unexpected break from Benson when he's paired with a rule-bending detective named Lucius Blaine (Anthony Anderson). The two work on a case involving a 16-year-old girl who was violently attacked by a pair of teen siblings, both of whom are obese. Serena Waldron: Natalie Cole. Jessica DeLay: Tricia Mara. Rudi: Omar Benson Miller. Lionel Granger: David Thornton

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A mother (Dana Eskelson) is devastated by the revelation that her 8-year-old son (Jack Vignone) has been sexually abused years after her ex-husband was sent to prison for molesting her older child, whose DNA now implicates him in his brother's case. TARU Tech Morales: Joel de la Fuente. Gregory Hensal: Tim Hopper. AUSA Donna Geysen: Kate Mulgrew

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Mental-health issues are explored during a case that starts off as a possible rape involving students at a preparatory high school where sexual experimentation is the norm. Jamie Hoskins: Brittany Snow. Derek Lord: Norman Reedus

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A young woman (Kristen Bush) refuses to cooperate during Benson's investigation of her brutal attack and rape, which seems to be connected to her involvement with a radical environmental group. Marcia Gay Harden reprises her role as FBI agent Star Morrison

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the disappearance of a 17-year-old girl (Betsy Hogg) with Turner's syndrome, a genetic disorder that contributed to her being teased and bullied by students at her prep school. Connie Nielsen plays Stabler's temporary partner. Colette Walsh: Betty Buckley. Connor: Daniel Farcher

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Stabler works a violent rape case with his new temporary partner, Dani Beck (Connie Nielsen), who he learns has a reputation for being overzealous, which is a serious cause for concern for Cragen. Martin Trenway: Charles Shaughnessy. Lorraine Delmas: Leslie Caron. Forensics Tech Ryan O'Halloran: Mike Doyle

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Dani (Connie Nielsen) has difficulty controlling her emotions while working to solve a sadistic double rape-homicide case involving a single mother and her young daughter. Jerry Lewis guest stars as a homeless man who becomes a suspect after Beck and Stabler discover his collection of newspaper clippings on sex crimes

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A rape victim loses her life while confronting her attacker, who assaulted her two separate times. The case leads Stabler and Dani to discover more victims of the same rapist, whom Huang pegs as an “alpha male.” Also, one of the young men who killed Dani's husband dies, and the other murderer tries to contact her from prison. Lorna Scarry: Mariette Hartley

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Benson's testimony is needed as ADA Novak tries to convict a brutal rapist. The trouble is that Benson, who's still in Oregon posing undercover as ecoterrorist Persephone James, has her own legal woes to deal with after a cocky deputy assaults her and she's questioned by a sheriff about a pharmaceutical employee's murder. Dean Porter: Vincent Spano. Debra Hartnell: Debra Jo Rupp. Sheriff Bartley: Charles Martin Smith. Hope: Maria Thayer. T-Bone: Chris Bowers

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A case hits close to home for Fin when his son (Ernest Waddell) becomes a suspect in a complex homicide investigation. Darius: Chris “Ludacris” Bridges. Teresa Randall: Lisa Gay Hamilton

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: When a 14-year-old boy (Malcolm David Kelley) witnesses the shooting death of his mother, he later commits the same crime against the prime suspect. The ensuing legal case raises questions about the aftereffects of gun violence, sparking a gun manufacturer's advocacy group to get involved. Ted Carthage: Gordon Clapp. Sophie Devere: Annie Potts

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler suspect a privileged college student of abandoning her newborn baby boy in a trash bin

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A successful lawyer's secret life as an exotic dancer is revealed to her boss (Rebecca De Mornay) and her fiancé after she and a stripper friend are found murdered. Chris Potter, Betty Buckley

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team must find a missing unmanned aerial vehicle, taken during a training exercise, before the deadly missile it's carrying is released

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team searches for a former Marine who murdered an Iraqi businessman he had been hired to protect

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team suspects that the death of a naval officer ruled as a suicide could be a murder, and that the crime implies a threat to national security

programme.title: House
programme.desc: House must resort to Webcam diagnosis when a psychiatrist (Mira Sorvino) comes down with a mysterious illness while trapped at an Antarctic research station with limited medical supplies. Meanwhile, Wilson is dating someone new, and House tries to figure out who it is. He's also very upset because the hospital is now charging patients for cable TV and he can no longer watch his favorite shows in "coma guy's" room (except on Tuesdays)

programme.title: House
programme.desc: A former music producer who had recently---and suddenly---converted to Hasidic Judaism collapses at her wedding, and House suspects that the reasons behind her sudden conversion might also have something to do with her mysterious illness. Meanwhile, Wilson is dating a woman whose personality is a lot like House's

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: While constructing a murder case, ADA Alexandra Cabot becomes the target of a Colombian drug cartel. Jack Hammond: Mitch Pileggi. Rafael Zapata: Jacinto Taras Riddick. Tim Donovan: Josh Hopkins. DA Arthur Branch: Fred Dalton Thompson. Sister Peg: Charlayne Woodard

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Faced with the expiration of a statute of limitations, the staff tries to find a rapist involved in three assaults that occurred five years earlier. Lyle Morris: John Driver. Jennifer Neal: Jenny Bacon. ADA Kathleen Eastman: Jenna Stern. Victoria Kraft: Judith Hawking. Lois Creen: Seana Kofoed. Benson: Mariska Hargitay. Stabler: Chris Meloni. Cragen: Dann Florek

programme.title: Milk
programme.desc: Sean Penn stars as murdered politician Harvey Milk, the first openly gay man in America to be elected to major public office when he won a seat on the San Francisco Board of Supervisors in 1977. James Franco, Josh Brolin. Directed by Gus Van Sant

programme.title: Cheers
programme.sub-title: Indoor Fun with Sammy and Robby
programme.desc: Rebecca's pubescent dreams of a perfect day with Robin are ruined by Sam, whom Robin goads into a series of childish challenges. Robin: Roger Rees. Pete: Peter Schreiner. Mark: Mark Arnott. Tim: Tim Cunningham

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom believes that a serial killer responsible for several deaths at a Las Vegas college over the past 17 years is at it again when body parts are found on campus. But the latest victim is a departure from the killer's previous targets. Lewis: David Lee Smith. Eva: Harriet Sansom Harris. Wilson: Ron Perkins. Beerly: Wayne Duvall. Greer: Taylor Nichols. Mathers: Victor Bevine. Roger: Patrick Levis. Mandy: Summer Glau. Kaitlin: April Bowlby

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A teen girl is killed in a luxury-casino suite where a private high-school homecoming party is being held, and the investigation reveals that another girl is missing, the victim of a possible kidnapping. Sofia: Louise Lombard. Macklin: Jon Tenney. Jensen: Jonathan Banks. Layne: Seth Gable. Tate: Mike Erwin. Paland: Matthew Carey. Bristol: Eric Lange. Miranda: Adrianne Palicki. Nikki: Danica Stewart. Janelle: Kate Mara. Rachel: Nicole Lenz

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom is plunged into the world of transgenders while investigating the murder of a woman who was slashed and mutilated after she stopped her car on a dark road outside of Vegas. This is the series' 100th episode. Mona: Lindsay Crouse. Wendy: Sarah Buxton. Laner: Raphael Sbarge. Mimosa: Kate Walsh. Hess: Sam Anderson. Dina: Lee Hardin. Bev: Marci Bowers

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A 14-year-old girl who was brutally beaten, raped and killed shares the same dog-paw tattoo as two other young female homicide victims. Despite warnings from Stabler, Dani (Connie Nielsen) becomes overly involved in the case. Victor Dodine: Michael Kenneth Williams. Belinda “Passion” Holt: Charlie Ray. Sister Peg: Charlayne Woodard. Judge Cohen: David Lipman

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: While searching for the woman responsible for handcuffing two traumatized adolescents in the back of a van, the detectives turn up evidence that leads them to suspect that many foster children are being put in danger. Also, Dani makes a decision about her future with the Special Victims Unit. Det. Dani Beck: Connie Nielsen. Dr. Rieff: Ken Howard

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Stabler agrees to hear the dying confession of a cancer patient named Judson Tierney (Brian Dennehy), but first he and Benson do some digging into what possible crime Tierney's guilty of and come up with an unsolved case that goes back 47 years. However, according to Tierney, that is merely the “tip of the iceberg.” Sheila Tierney: Paget Brewster. Elizabeth Donnelly: Judith Light. Rita Colino: Victoria Wyndham. Mike Mollinax: John Doman

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Fin looks into an alleged rape at the college where his son, Ken, works. Fin is joined in his investigation by a Brooklyn SVU detective named Chester Lake (Adam Beach), who is working a strikingly similar case. Kal Penn. Ken Randall: Ernest Waddell

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: In the fourth-season finale, Gibbs tries to find out why the agents are required to take Homeland Security polygraph tests; and Tony and Jeanne are held captive by a drug dealer

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: In the fifth-season opener, the team has a devastating confrontation with La Grenouille (Armand Assante) that turns deadly. Trent Kort: David Dayan Fisher. Col. Jasper Shepard: Webster Williams

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Benson investigates a rape case outside her jurisdiction and must meet with a police psychologist (Mary Stuart Masterson) to discuss her recent actions that have led to tensions with Stabler. Capt. Julia Millfield: Kim Delaney

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A male prostitute's death leads detectives to a preacher whose family life is not as ideal as it seems. Jeb Curtis: Tim Daly. Hannah: Kathy Baker

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the murder of a Hudson University student (Tess Soltau), whose body was found in a seedy alley. A search of the victim's dorm room turns up a suspiciously large amount of cash, especially considering she was dependent on financial aid. Adam Halder: Will Estes. Gloria Culhane: Trieste Dunn. Roddy Franklin: Mathew St. Patrick. Walter Camp: Joey Slotnick

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Pritchetts rally for a good cause after a neighbor's house burns down, but there is a downside to their Samaritan intentions when Jay hurts his back; Cameron takes on a moving truck; and some donated toys fall into the wrong hands. Directed by Fred Savage

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil's preoccupation with a business opportunity blinds him to his new partner's inappropriate behavior around Claire. Meanwhile, Jay and Gloria may regret letting Mitchell and Cameron be their temporary house guests when their home is being fumigated

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The pressure is on Mitchell to get Cameron's birthday celebration just right, since he was born on Leap Day and it only comes once every four years. Meanwhile, Jay undergoes a masculinity crisis; and Phil's Leap Day plans hit a snag

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Cameron has a reunion with his estranged clown partner at a funeral for their former mentor; Phil gets bullied by a real-estate rival when he tries to land an important listing; Jay and Gloria are leery of Manny's new friend

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire's race for town council comes to a head on Election Day as the Dunphys make phone calls for votes and Mitchell and Cameron take to the streets to campaign, while the candidate endures technical problems during some last-minute interviews

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Indy races to rescue an old friend who has vanished after discovering a strange artifact that could hold the key to world domination. Old friends, new enemies and spectacular action sequences abound against a backdrop of Cold War intrigue
